comments: Even though I&quotecharm not sure of the purpose of this study, I thought it was really enjoyable as I like working with the English language.

While I believe the hit itself is worth $3, I do appreciate the extra 60 cents which puts your HIT above average in terms of pay. I would recommend it to others based on this, rather than telling them not to do it or that perhaps their time is best spent elsewhere.

workerid: I felt like more was supposed to happen. I have done similar language HITs, and generally this is just the intro to learning the language. There are many more items and conjugations which we are introduced to, but I suppose that is not within the scope of your study.

comments: It made sense to me.  Worked smoothly
i wasnt totally sure what glab ment but i was pretty convinced of what lann ment
